a_sch_class1d_eve01: Riolu becomes mega awesome once it evolves!
a_sch_class1d_eve02: Shinx becomes super cool once it evolves!
a_sch_class1d_eve09:
Instead of battling, I’d rather spend time taking
care of my Pokémon.\c
Giving them a nice wash when we’re on a picnic
is relaxing for them AND for me!
a_sch_class1d_eve10:
There are Pokémon like Pachirisu that don’t
evolve—but then there are Pokémon like Eevee\r
that have all sorts of Evolutions!
a_sch_class1d_ni01:
One Meowth, two Meowth! A pair of my
favorite Pokémon, side by side...\c
This. Is. Bliss!
a_sch_class1d_ni04:
I’m having my Pokémon keep an eye on me so I
don’t slack off on my studies.
